normalised: Oye! Gas Cylinder Prices Got You Down? Here's the Chai Patti!

unnormalised: Oye! Gas Cylinder Prices Got You Down? Here's the Chai Patti!
normalised: Seems like that budget's taking a hit again, folks! News coming in hot from Delhi is that your friendly neighbourhood gas cylinder could be costing you a bit more this week. Sources are whispering about a possible rupee fifty hike, but don't panic and start dusting off the chulha just yet!

unnormalised: Seems like that budget's taking a hit again, folks! News coming in hot from Delhi is that your friendly neighbourhood gas cylinder could be costing you a bit more this week. Sources are whispering about a possible Rs. 50 hike, but don't panic and start dusting off the chulha just yet!
normalised: Doctor Sharma from the Ministry of Petroleum confirmed prices are being reviewed in light of global energy fluctuations – blame it on the videshis! Apparently, crude oil prices have been doing the bhangra, and that affects our desi gas prices too.

unnormalised: Dr. Sharma from the Ministry of Petroleum confirmed prices are being reviewed in light of global energy fluctuations – blame it on the videshis! Apparently, crude oil prices have been doing the bhangra, and that affects our desi gas prices too.
normalised: So, what can you do? Well, start planning those vegetarian meals, maybe? Or convince your neighbour, Missus Iyer, to share her delicious sambar (for a small fee, of course!). Jokes apart, keep an eye on your local dealer. They'll have the real scoop. And hey, maybe start exploring those solar-powered cooking options for that one thousand square feet terrace! Stay tuned for more updates!
